title: Sustainable Design Hackathon
description: Awarded 3rd place in an intensive 2-day hackathon focused on sustainable innovation. Expanded the 'GuardianX' project into a comprehensive multi-app ecosystem, developing a dedicated mobile application during the competition. The project received high praise from the jury for its technical execution and innovative approach to pest detection. Despite facing highly experienced competitors, secured a top-three finish and a 1000 AZN cash prize.
